* Dual Processor Xeon Nahelem 5520 Servers (16 Core CPUs) with 12 – 16 GB RAM

* 24x7 Real Tech Support – 15 mins Response Time Guaranteed


Network & Facilities:
* High Performance Servers at SoftLayer Data Centers
* Choice of Network Location: Dallas / Seattle / Washington
* Cisco Systems 10G Network
* Cisco Guard DDOS Protection
